name: SUPER GOALBOY
description:
It's the last minute of the match and the team is counting on you to make the last goal, don't let the rival team stop you from your dream of winnig the championship. Controls:

---------------------------------------------------------------

Moving mode

Left/Right Arrows to move.

Space to jump. (Longer you hold, higher you jump; Double jump)

Q when near ball to enter kicking mode.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Kicking mode

Q again in kicking mode to exit it.

Left/Right arrows when in kicking mode to rotate the shoot point.

Space when in kicking mode to charge the kick (Can't change the angle once charging).

---------------------------------------------------------------

R in any moment to reset the level.
